description: Variation of condition 2 (Approved Drawings) of planning permission 2019/0786 dated 27/11/2019 for “Partial demolition of 180-182 Shoreditch High Street together with internal alterations and change of use to flexible commercial (A1/A2/A3/A4) and refurbishment of existing residential units (C3) and associated access and storage together with other associated works (in association with Listed Building Consent 2019/0832)”. The proposal includes the following changes: Extract flue and associated plant to rear and removal of proposed internal flue;Amended shopfronts along Anning Street; Amended landscaping/public realm on Anning Street;Railings to basement windows on Shoreditch High Street; Additional service risers from the basement to the first floor roof;  Additional pipework to rear elevation;Installation of 4x service risers from basement to first floor; Layout change to approved basement layouts including the plant room and residential bike store; Omission of the approved enclosure to the first floor external roof plant to allow for natural ventilation; Amendments to fenestration, including new rear utility door, two additional rooflights and the enlargement of a rooflight at second floor level;Changes to pavement lights to front and rear.
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">No piling shall take place until a piling method statement (detailing the depth and type of piling to be undertaken and the methodology by which such piling will be carried out, including measures to prevent and minimise the potential for damage to subsurface sewerage infrastructure, and the programme for the works) has been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority in consultation with Thames Water. Any piling must be undertaken in accordance with the terms of the approved piling method statement.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-b6b15e82-7fff-cd01-7480-ab84cda905d7"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: The proposed works will be in close proximity to underground sewerage utility infrastructure. Piling has the potential to impact on local underground sewerage utility infrastructure.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Any demolition and construction works to 180-182 Shoreditch High Street’ shall be carried out in accordance with the submitted Demolition and Environmental Management Plan (DEMP) Rev 02, prepared 06/11/19 by Erith.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-5fa116e3-7fff-6a53-e2a3-aacc40827880"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The development hereby approved shall not be occupied until a detailed Delivery and Servicing Management Plan has been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. Delivery and Servicing to the site shall only be carried out in accordance with the details thus approved, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-360b6c01-7fff-03dd-3274-657697a75ecc"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To avoid hazard and obstruction being caused to users of the public highway and in the interest of public safety and amenity. </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to first occupation of any part of the development hereby approved, details refuse/recycling management strategy shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. All refuse/recycling shall be managed in accordance with these details unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-240d11df-7fff-a2bb-bf3c-5679f6af2bcd"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To reduce pollution and the likelihood of infestation&nbsp;</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to occupation of the drinking establishment (Sui Generis) uses hereby approved, details of how this space will be managed to safeguard against noise, disturbance and anti-social behaviour shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-21445d7f-7fff-5257-8ca5-9e083c76356f"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To safeguard against potential anti-social behaviour.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The proposed restaurant use (Class E(b)) or drinking establishment use (Sui Generis) hereby permitted shall only be open to the public between (08:00) hours and (24:00) hours Monday to Sunday including Bank Holidays, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-75f49a3c-7fff-0200-b1d3-d3cd88cf1e55"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the use is operated in a satisfactory manner and does not unduly disturb adjoining occupiers or prejudice local amenity generally. </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Restaurant (Class E(b)) uses shall not commence unless and until details of kitchen extraction for the relevant part of the development have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-390fb330-7fff-94a4-0660-62a15ed56903"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of odour nuisance.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Noise levels from any plant or machinery shall at all times be at least 5dB(A) below background levels when measured at any nearby residential window.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-6c9bcbf4-7fff-00d3-1238-e82f6d031eb4"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance from plant and machinery. </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">No new grilles, security alarms, lighting, security or other cameras or other fixtures or plant shall be mounted on the external faces or roof of the building other than those shown on the drawings hereby approved.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-e7945792-7fff-706c-c620-17e75c5d2c97"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building. </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">No new plumbing, pipes, soil-stacks, flues, vents or ductwork shall be fixed on the external faces of the building other than those shown on the drawings hereby approved.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-8bdb5f05-7fff-305d-1d99-b2cea828c0ad"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building. </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The new facing brickwork shall match the existing brickwork adjacent in respect of dimensions, colour, texture, face bond, and pointing unless otherwise approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-29364e2d-7fff-cf3a-1c48-ebc48a59c485"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">All new work shall match the existing adjacent work in respect to materials, dimensions, colour and texture, unless shown otherwise on the drawings or other documentation hereby approved or required by any condition(s) attached to this consent.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-9eeba3d5-7fff-8aea-5a00-a480ffeb9a22"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.&nbsp;</span></p><p><b style="font-weight:normal;" id="docs-internal-guid-a7ae2f12-7fff-0aee-01d8-fd8e5da62723"><br></b></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">2019/0786:</span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"> Demolition and Environmental Management Plan (DEMP) Rev 02, prepared 06/11/19 by Erith.</span></p><p><b style="font-weight:normal;"><br></b></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">2021/2567 MMA: </span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Cover Letter dated 29 September 2021, Minor Material Amendment - Supporting Information R014 - Rev. P00 - August 2021, Addendum Historic Building Report for Brockton Capital dated August 2021, Acoustic assessment addendum: Kitchen extract flue dated 29th September 2021, Composite Slab Justification by Heyne Tillett Steel,&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">18015_PL_(00)_P099 Rev P05, (00)_P100 Rev P03, (00)_P101 Rev P03, (00)_P102 Rev P03, (00)_P103 Rev P03, (00)_P104 Rev P03, (00)_P201 Rev P02, (00)_P202 Rev P03,&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">(00)_P203 Rev P03, (00)_P301 Rev P03, (00)_P302 Rev P04, (00)_P304 Rev P03,&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">(00)_P305 Rev P03, (00)_P311 Rev P04, (00)_P320 Rev P04, (12)_P099 Rev P03</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">(12)_P100 Rev P03, (12)_P101 Rev P02, (12)_P102 Rev P02, (12)_P103 Rev P03,</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">(12)_P110 Rev P02, (35)_P099 Rev P04.</span></p><p><b style="font-weight:normal;"><br></b></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">2021/2220:</span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#38761d;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"> </span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#333333;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Planning Conditions Discharge Report R010 Rev P02 November 2021 by Allford Hall Monaghan Morris, Planning Conditions Discharge Drawings by Allford Hall Monaghan Morris, (27)_P611 Rev P02, (27)_P612 Rev P02, (00)_P320 Rev P03, (21)_P401 Rev P02, (21)_P901 Rev P02,&nbsp; Rev P02, Site Photographs by Hutton + Rostron Environmental Investigations Ltd</span></p><p><br><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved. </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years from 27/11/2019, the date of the original permission.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-1a504767-7fff-4e3b-7bbd-1be7c35bcfe8"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended.&nbsp;</span></p>
